Fales Library and Special Collections
My Own Magazine Archive
My Own Mag
MSS.018
0.25 Linear Feet in 1 box
1963-1965 The My Own Magazine Archive contains correspondence and submissions made to the editor, Jeff Nuttall. Submissions included are manuscripts from William Burroughs, Robert Creeley, Lawrence Ferlinghetti, and Allen Ginsberg. This collection also incorporates The Moving Times, a magazine edited by William Burroughs.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); My Own Magazine Archive; MSS 018; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections , New York University Libraries.
Historical Note
The My Own Magazine Archive is a collection of correspondence, manuscripts, and issues of the magazine, edited by Jeff Nuttall. This archive also incorporates the magazine The Moving Times, edited by William Burroughs.
Scope and Contents
The My Own Magazine Archive contains correspondence and submissions made to the editor, Jeff Nuttall. Submissions included are manuscripts from William Burroughs, Robert Creeley, Lawrence Ferlinghetti, and Allen Ginsberg. This collection also incorporates The Moving Times, a magazine edited by William Burroughs.
Arrangement
The collection is arranged in alphabetical and chronological order.
Series I: Correspondence and Manuscripts
Series II: Issues
Separated Material
There is no information about materials that are associated by provenance to the described materials that have been physically separated or removed.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

Series I: Correspondence and Manuscripts
Scope and Contents note
Series 1 contains a half box of correspondence and manuscripts written or submitted to Jeff Nuttall, editor of My Own Magazine.
